name: Boss Fight Simulator (Pre-Alpha)
description:
(Attention: this game is currently in beta, because of which some of the details described below may not work, and will appear only in the future.  Beta is just a demonstration of maps and some of the features on the menu)

Boss Fight Simulator is single and multiplayer game, where you can play as hero and a monster who acts as a boss.

In this game, you can fully customize the boss battle, you can both play as a hero to kill the boss, and be the boss himself to kill the heroes.

The game have two languages: English and Russian

Discord server: https://discord.gg/fAj3xjc
